title: Blue Ridge National Heritage Area: Park Home
body: A Place Unlike Any Other on Earth.  The Blue Ridge National Heritage Area is a place unlike any other on Earth, where ancient landscapes enchant the eye and age-old traditions warm the heart.  The distinctive landscape of the North Carolina mountains and foothills combined with the region’s living traditions of craft, music, agriculture and Cherokee heritage create a wealth of natural and cultural treasures unmatched in our country. Read More             Mississippi Hills NHA   Mississippi HIlls NHA is one of 12 NHAs in the Southeast.
